title: Gerard Pique Calls It A Career
description:
The FC crew discuss Gerard Pique announcing his retirement from professional football and the reasons behind the decision to do so early in the season. Plus, Bruno Fernandes offers a strong message to Manchester united youngster Alejandro Garnacho, Zlatan Ibrahimovic criticizes Kylian Mbappe's decision to stay at PSG and Jurgen Klopp asks for players not to be criticized on playing in the World Cup.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Gerard Pique announces his retirement; Fernandes' message to Garnacho; Zlatan criticizes Mbappe's PSG decision
